name: Shadowscape
description:
Controls relative to camera Position/Direction!Make ths shadows all black!!

 Ludum Dare 41 Page https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/spacescape

Theme: Combine two unlikely genres

A short meditative puzzle  game with abstract music and art.

Carefully  maneuver  your ship to match the shadow projections on the wall

Developed in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41 , I started on the Sunday with a simple old concept I had been meaning to finish. Feature creep got the better of me and I started putting in a few too many things at the end.Came together nicely though, might update in future if it gets any notice.

Controls:

Mouse :Look

Space: Ascend

Shift:Descend

WASD:Forward/Left/Back/Right

Q: Rotate Left

E:Rotate Right

Hope you Enjoy

Gonz0
